panels.title: Connections

panels.title: Sessions

panels.description: Topic activity - message write/send rates and current topic count
panels.title: Topics

panels.description: Subscription event rates - subscribe/unsubscribe success/fail
panels.title: Subscribers

panels.description: Subscription type breakdown - shared subscriptions, shared groups, and exclusive subscriptions
panels.title: Shared Subscriptions

panels.description: Retained message state and activity - current count, receive/send rates
panels.title: Retained Messages

panels.description: CPU usage of the RobustMQ broker process, normalized by CPU core count
panels.title: Process CPU Usage

panels.description: Overall system CPU usage across all processes
panels.title: System CPU Usage

panels.description: Memory usage (RSS) of the RobustMQ broker process as a percentage of total system memory
panels.title: Process Memory Usage

panels.description: Overall system memory usage across all processes
panels.title: System Memory Usage

panels.description: CPU usage trend: broker process vs overall system
panels.title: CPU Usage Trend

panels.description: Memory usage trend: broker process vs overall system
panels.title: Memory Usage Trend

panels.description: Total handler requests per second (all network types)
panels.title: Total QPS

panels.description: Cumulative count of slow requests (processing time > 1s)
panels.title: Slow Requests Total (>1s)

panels.description: Cumulative count of handler apply timeouts (processing time > 30s hard deadline)
panels.title: Handler Timeouts Total (>30s)

panels.description: Handler request throughput per second, broken down by network type (TCP/WebSocket/TLS/QUIC)
panels.title: Handler QPS by Network

panels.description: Rate of slow requests (>1s) and hard-deadline timeouts (>30s) per second by network type
panels.title: Slow & Timeout Rate by Network

panels.description: Handler queue depth (used vs remaining capacity). High used + low remaining indicates handler backpressure.
panels.title: Handler Queue Depth

panels.description: End-to-end latency from request arrival to response written (includes queue wait + apply + write)
panels.title: Handler Total Latency

panels.description: Time a request spent waiting in the channel queue before a handler picked it up
panels.title: Queue Wait Latency

panels.description: Time spent in command.apply() — the core business logic (auth, session, gRPC calls, etc.)
panels.title: Apply Latency (Business Logic)

panels.description: Time spent writing the response packet back to the client over TCP/WebSocket/QUIC
panels.title: Response Write Latency

panels.description: QPS per individual handler thread. Uneven distribution indicates load imbalance; a handler near 0 may be stuck.
panels.title: Handler Instance QPS

panels.description: P99 apply latency per individual handler thread. A handler with significantly higher P99 than others is likely stuck on a slow gRPC call or blocking I/O.
panels.title: Handler Instance Apply P99 Latency

panels.description: Processing rate (requests per second) for each MQTT packet type
panels.title: MQTT Packet Process QPS by Type

panels.description: Average processing latency for each MQTT packet type
panels.title: MQTT Packet Process Avg Latency by Type

panels.description: Overall MQTT packet processing latency percentiles (P50/P95/P99) across all packet types
panels.title: MQTT Packet Process Latency Percentiles

panels.description: P99 processing latency for each MQTT packet type (Connect, Publish, Subscribe, PingReq, etc.)
panels.title: MQTT Packet Process P999 Latency by Type

panels.description: MQTT total received packet rate (QPS)
panels.title: MQTT Total Received Packet Rate (QPS)

panels.description: MQTT received packet rate by packet type (QPS)
panels.title: MQTT Received Packet Rate by Type (QPS)

panels.description: MQTT total sent packet rate (QPS)
panels.title: MQTT Total Sent Packet Rate (QPS)

panels.description: MQTT sent packet rate by packet type and QoS (QPS)
panels.title: MQTT Sent Packet Rate by Type (QPS)

panels.description: Gap between last_log_index and last_applied; non-zero means state machine is falling behind
panels.title: Raft Apply Lag (log - applied)

panels.description: Raft write requests per second by machine
panels.title: Raft Write Rate (req/s)

panels.description: Raft write success per second by machine
panels.title: Raft Write Success Rate (req/s)

panels.description: Raft write failures per second by machine
panels.title: Raft Write Failure Rate (/s)

panels.description: Raft RPC requests per second by machine
panels.title: Raft RPC Rate (req/s)

panels.description: Raft write QPS grouped by machine (metadata / offset / mqtt)
panels.title: Raft Write QPS (by Machine)

panels.description: Raft write latency percentiles grouped by machine
panels.title: Raft Write Latency (by Machine)

panels.description: Raft RPC QPS grouped by machine and rpc_type
panels.title: Raft RPC QPS (by Machine / RPC Type)

panels.description: Raft RPC latency percentiles grouped by machine and rpc_type
panels.title: Raft RPC Latency (by Machine / RPC Type)

panels.description: RocksDB P99 latency for each operation type (save, get, delete, list, etc.)
panels.title: RocksDB P99 Latency by Operation

panels.description: RocksDB operation QPS by operation type (save, get, delete, list, etc.)
panels.title: RocksDB QPS by Operation

panels.description: RocksDB operation QPS by source (caller module)
panels.title: RocksDB QPS by Source

panels.description: RocksDB write (save) operation latency percentiles
panels.title: RocksDB Write (Save) Latency

panels.description: RocksDB read (get) operation latency percentiles
panels.title: RocksDB Read (Get) Latency

panels.description: gRPC requests per second (all services/methods combined)
panels.title: gRPC Requests Rate (req/s)

panels.description: gRPC total errors (all non-OK statuses)
panels.title: gRPC Total Errors

panels.description: gRPC error rate = errors / requests * 100%
panels.title: gRPC Error Rate (%)

panels.description: gRPC QPS: total QPS and QPS grouped by service/method
panels.title: gRPC QPS (req/s)

panels.description: gRPC error QPS grouped by service/method/status_code
panels.title: gRPC Error QPS

panels.description: gRPC overall latency percentiles P50/P95/P99/P999 (all methods combined)
panels.title: gRPC Latency Percentiles

panels.description: gRPC P99 latency by method, useful for identifying slow endpoints
panels.title: gRPC P99 Latency by Method

panels.description: P99 latency of outgoing gRPC client calls grouped by service/method
panels.title: gRPC Client Call P99 Latency by Method

panels.description: Overall latency percentiles of all outgoing gRPC client calls
panels.title: gRPC Client Call Latency Percentiles

panels.description: QPS of outgoing gRPC client calls grouped by service/method
panels.title: gRPC Client Call QPS by Method

panels.description: HTTP Admin total requests (all endpoints combined)
panels.title: HTTP Admin Total Requests

panels.description: HTTP Admin total errors (4xx + 5xx)
panels.title: HTTP Admin Total Errors

panels.description: HTTP Admin error rate = errors / requests * 100%
panels.title: HTTP Admin Error Rate (%)

panels.description: HTTP Admin QPS: total QPS and QPS grouped by endpoint
panels.title: HTTP Admin QPS (req/s)

panels.description: HTTP Admin error QPS grouped by endpoint and status code
panels.title: HTTP Admin Error QPS

panels.description: HTTP Admin overall latency percentiles P50/P95/P99/P999 (all endpoints combined)
panels.title: HTTP Admin Latency Percentiles

panels.description: HTTP Admin P99 latency by endpoint, useful for identifying slow endpoints
panels.title: HTTP Admin P99 Latency by Endpoint

panels.description: Total number of messages enqueued into the delay queue
panels.title: Enqueue Total

panels.description: Total number of delay messages delivered to target topics
panels.title: Deliver Total

panels.description: Total number of delay message delivery failures
panels.title: Deliver Failures

panels.description: Messages recovered from persistent storage on startup (normal + expired)
panels.title: Recovery Total

panels.description: Enqueue and deliver QPS for delay messages
panels.title: Delay Message QPS (Enqueue / Deliver)

panels.description: Delay queue shard capacity (total, used, remaining) per shard
panels.title: Delay Queue Shard Capacity

panels.description: Enqueue duration percentiles (P50/P95/P99) for writing messages into the delay queue
panels.title: Enqueue Latency Percentiles

panels.description: Delivery duration percentiles (P50/P95/P99) for sending delay messages to target topics
panels.title: Deliver Latency Percentiles
